name: Magic Missile
description: Launches three glowing darts of magical force that unerringly strike their target. Cannot miss.

name: Fireball
description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame.

name: Frost Bolt
description: A bolt of freezing cold energy streaks toward a creature within range, dealing frost damage and potentially slowing the target.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A stroke of lightning forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose.

name: Heal
description: A wave of healing energy flows through a creature you touch, restoring vitality and closing wounds.

name: Mage Armor
description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends.

name: Shield
description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC.

name: Burning Hands
description: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips.

name: Ice Shard
description: You create a shard of ice and fling it at one creature within range. The shard explodes on impact, dealing frost damage.

name: Shock
description: A jolt of electricity arcs from your fingertips toward a target within range, dealing electrical damage.

name: Entangle
description: Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square starting from a point within range.

name: Detect Magic
description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. You learn the school of magic, if any.

name: Minor Heal
description: A creature you touch regains a small number of hit points. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

name: Chill Touch
description: You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range. The target takes necrotic damage and cannot regain hit points until the start of your next turn.

name: Thunderwave
description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw.

name: Ray of Frost
description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target.

name: Produce Flame
description: A flickering flame appears in your hand. The flame remains there for the duration and harms neither you nor your equipment.

name: Guidance
description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice.

name: Magic Weapon
description: You touch a nonmagical weapon. Until the spell ends, that weapon becomes a magic weapon with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

name: Lightbloom
description: Casts a burst of mystical blooms that heal allies.
